name: ProductReference
description: inventory-service reference to Product entity contract via local cache table

requiredFields.name: id
requiredFields.description: Product unique identifier - primary key in product_cache, used to join with inventory records

requiredFields.name: sku
requiredFields.description: Stock Keeping Unit - product identity field stored locally for immediate access

optionalFields.name: name
optionalFields.description: Product name - optional for enrichment, stored locally

usagePoints.purpose: Provides ProductId and ProductSku identity fields in inventory response via local product_cache table join

notes: inventory-service maintains a local product_cache table containing only essential identity fields (id, sku, name) from Product entity. This avoids repeated service calls while keeping DTOs accurate with current Product identity data. Cache is updated on-demand when inventory records reference new products.
